allow:
Bash(git -C "D:\\Python\\mercor\\sahumario-neel\\model_b" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: UI improvements, Razorpay payment integration, admin panel, and cleanup

- Tasks 1-7: performance cleanup \(deleted 14 dead files\), accessibility \(ARIA, keyboard\), SEO metadata, responsive Tailwind fixes, cart/state stability, docs
- Payment Tasks 1-2: checkout UI redesign with step progress, Razorpay SDK helpers, 4-step payment flow
- Admin page: product CRUD with direct GitHub commit via Contents API
- Updated README with full dev progress log

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(git -C "D:\\Python\\mercor\\sahumario-neel\\model_b" add api/ vercel.json package.json README.md)

Bash(git -C "D:\\Python\\mercor\\sahumario-neel\\model_b" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(payments\): add Vercel serverless order creation and signature verification

- api/payments/razorpay/order.js: creates Razorpay order via Node SDK
- api/payments/razorpay/verify.js: verifies HMAC-SHA256 payment signature
- vercel.json: SPA fallback rewrite for client-side routing
- package.json: add razorpay ^2.9.6 dependency

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(git -C "D:\\Python\\mercor\\sahumario-neel\\model_b" add src/lib/paymentLogger.js src/pages/CheckoutPage.jsx src/components/CartSummary.jsx .env.example README.md)

Bash(git -C "D:\\Python\\mercor\\sahumario-neel\\model_b" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(payments\): complete full payment flow â€” verify, success UX, logging, polish

- CheckoutPage: POST to /api/payments/razorpay/verify after capture; persist
  order to OrdersContext on verified success; success screen with order ID
- CheckoutSteps advances to Payment step while loading
- paymentLogger.js: structured paymentLog\(\) + friendlyPaymentError\(\) mapper
- .env.example: documents all env vars with browser vs server-side separation
- active:scale-95 on all CTA buttons; auto-focus success heading for a11y

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "D:\\Python\\mercor\\sahumario-neel\\model_b" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: add Security section documenting admin and payment protections

Honestly documents what is and isn''t protected:
- Admin page has no auth guard; AuthContext exists but is unwired
- Payment uses HMAC-SHA256 signature verification, not custom OTP
- Notes Razorpay-managed OTP for UPI/cards
- Flags client-submitted amount as a known limitation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(git -C "D:\\Python\\mercor\\sahumario-neel\\model_b" add src/index.js src/App.js src/context/AuthContext.jsx src/pages/LoginPage.jsx src/pages/AdminPage.jsx README.md)

Bash(git -C "D:\\Python\\mercor\\sahumario-neel\\model_b" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(auth\): wire login guard for admin route

- index.js: add AuthProvider to provider tree
- App.js: import useAuth + LoginPage; admin case redirects to login if !user
- LoginPage: accept redirectAfterLogin prop; replace alert\(\) with inline error banner
- AuthContext: add null guard to useAuth for consistency
- AdminPage: show logged-in user name/email + logout button; accept setCurrentPage prop
- README: update security section to reflect auth guard is now active

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "D:\\Python\\mercor\\sahumario-neel\\model_b" add package.json src/lib/supabase.js src/context/AuthContext.jsx src/context/OrdersContext.js src/App.js src/pages/AdminPage.jsx .env.example README.md)

Bash(git -C "D:\\Python\\mercor\\sahumario-neel\\model_b" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: integrate Supabase for auth and order persistence

- @supabase/supabase-js added as dependency
- src/lib/supabase.js: client singleton \(REACT_APP_SUPABASE_URL + ANON_KEY\)
- AuthContext: rewritten with Supabase signIn/signUp/signOut; loading state
  prevents login-form flash during session restore
- OrdersContext: syncs orders to Supabase on addOrder; reloads from DB on login
- App.js: show spinner while authLoading before rendering admin route guard
- AdminPage: read name from user_metadata.name \(Supabase shape\)
- .env.example + README: Supabase setup guide with SQL schema and RLS policies

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "D:\\Python\\mercor\\sahumario-neel\\model_b" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: prevent blank-page crash when Supabase env vars are missing

- vercel.json: explicitly set outputDirectory=build so static assets
  \(manifest.json, favicon, etc.\) are served correctly
- supabase.js: fall back to placeholder values if env vars not set so
  createClient never throws at module load; warns in console instead

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add policy pages and admin approval workflow

- Add Privacy Policy, Refund & Return, Shipping, and Terms & Conditions
  pages sourced from legal docx documents
- Add Policies column to Footer linking all four policy pages
- Rework AdminPage with tabbed pending-review + live-products workflow:
  image upload via Supabase Storage, Approve auto-commits to GitHub,
  Reject marks submission as rejected in Supabase

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
